effect:
No Guard ensures that all attacks used by, and targeted at, the ability-bearer hit without fail.
This includes moves used on a Pokémon in the hidden stages of the moves Fly, Dive, Dig and Shadow Force.
If a Pokémon with No Guard is the leading party Pokémon, wild Pokémon are twice as likely to appear.
description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
